text:
A recent poll by the @R_S_P_H found that only 57% of BAME respondents were likely to accept the #COVID19 #vaccine. 

It is vital that BAME communities are vaccinated to reduce the disproportionate impact of COVID-19. 

Dr @SekeramMohan explains more
👉 https://t.co/KSP32njiMG https://t.co/3nuWE9gycq
